mapper.sql: d.id id, d.title title, d.content content, d.year year, d.publishTime publishTime, d.roleId roleId, d.dScore dScore, d.lScore lScore, d.hScore hScore, d.rate rate, d.sumScore sumScore
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO t_dangze (title,content,year,publishTime,roleId,dScore,lScore,hScore,rate,sumScore) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{year},#{publishTime},#{roleId},#{dScore},#{lScore},#{hScore},#{rate},#{sumScore})
mapper.select: SELECT d_c.id,d_c.content,d_c.userId,d_c.arrangeId, d_a.dangzeId, d3_a.dangzeId dangze3Id, u_d.id userDangZeId,u_d.commitTime FROM t_dangze_content d_c LEFT JOIN t_dangze_arrange d_a ON d_c.arrangeId = d_a.id LEFT JOIN t_dangze3_arrange d3_a ON d_c.arrangeId = d3_a.id LEFT JOIN t_user_dangze u_d ON d_c.userId = u_d.userId and IFNULL(d_a.time,d3_a.time) = u_d.time and IFNULL(d_a.dangzeId,d3_a.dangzeId) = u_d.dangzeId WHERE d_c.year=#{year} and u_d.state = 1
